title: Creating the 217mph Lamborghini LP750-4 SV Story - /DRIVEN
description: SPONSORED CONTENT: Lamborghini's head of Research and Development, Maurizio Reggiani, guides us around the Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya with the new Lamborghini LP750-4 Superveloce. A man who has spent the past two decades associated with some of the greatest vehicles every produced in the Volkswagen family, Mr. Reggiani explains why the new SV is more than what meets the eyes.
